title: Surviving Shane: Volume One
description: Shane is a dangerous man. He gets what he wants, and he wants Mia. As the daughter of a Russian mafia underboss, she's had enough experience with the criminal element to know she wants no part of it. Too bad for Mia that Shane refuses to take no for an answer.(This is the first installment of a dark erotic romance serial and ends with a cliffhanger. This serial includes explicit sexual content and violence that may disturb readers who are sensitive to such topics. )
author: Raurie Saxon
